name: GoogleVerse DarkExpanse
description:
This style will only provide support for Google.com and it's various sites as well. As with all of my styles, these are also very dark (mostly black)!

You should now also separately install my Wikipedia DeepPurple Molecular Sidebar (http://userstyles.org/styles/3608), so as to properly render the molecular images on Wikipedia.

Xavian-Anderson Macpherson
Shingoshi

http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/8403/googlewiki3lj1.png
additional_info:
2007.Oct.30 Tue, 12:48 --700 (PDT) >> I have removed YouTube from this style. It is now separately supported In my TubeWorm BlackWiggly style (http://userstyles.org/styles/3966).

2007.Oct.14 Sun, 15:19 --700 (PDT) >> I AM SEPARATING THIS STYLE INTO TWO PARTS. The management of these two sites (Google and Wikipedia) together, is a nightmare. Anytime I try to fix one, it disrupts the other.

Latest version:
2007.Oct.08 Mon, 03:15 --700 (PDT) >> Same as below.
2007.Oct.01 Mon, 04:26 --700 (PDT) >> Fixed another background error.
2007.Sep.30 Sun, 01:54 --700 (PDT) >> Removing some ads!
